description: 1000+ fill-in-the-blank sentences for visual learning. Teaches English grammar, vocabulary, and common expressions.

sentences.text: there are ____ days in a week
there are ____ months in a year
i go to bed at ____ pm
a penny saved is a penny ____
there ____ a book on the table
the more you try the ____ you get
the game was ____ by our team
if i were rich i would ____
vowels are a e i o and ____
i would like to ____ a table
